mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.role, t.description, t.level, t.is_register_default, t.create_time FROM role t, user_role_ref r WHERE r.user_id = #{value} AND t.id = r.role_id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t.level DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_role_ref WHERE user_id = #{value} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT count( * ) FROM user_role_ref r, user t WHERE r.role_id = #{value} AND r.user_id = t.id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0

SELECT t.id, t.role, t.description, t.is_register_default, t.level, count( * ) AS count FROM user_role_ref r, role t WHERE t.id = r.role_id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.role_id order by t.level ASC
SELECT t.id, t.role, t.description, t.is_register_default, t.level FROM role t WHERE t.level <= #{level} AND t.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t.level DESC
SELECT MAX(t.level) FROM user_role_ref r, role t WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.role_id = t.id
SELECT t.id, t.role, t.description, t.level, t.is_register_default, t.create_time FROM role t WHERE t.is_register_default = 1 ORDER BY t.level ASC LIMIT 1
